name: Mummies

Neutral.Abilities: :unit_attack: Ignore the result on the [Attack die](../dice.md#attack-die). :unit_passive: Whenever this unit is attacked, set your opponent's [Attack die](../dice.md#attack-die) to "-1".

notes: The player still rolls the Attack die, as other effects that are related to the Attack die result may still apply.
For each Attack against the Mummies, only its initial Attack die roll is set to -1. After a roll is *set*, it can be modified by rerolls.
